title: Substitution in Function
text: How can we substitute 8 into the equation?

title: Substitution in Function
text: How can we substitute 8 into the equation? We can replace x with 8 in the given function expression.

title: Taking the Square Root.
text: What is $$\sqrt{25}$$, what can be multiplied by itself to get 25? $$5\times5=25$$. Therefore, $$\sqrt{25}=f(8)=5$$.
